name: Neutralizer
desc: Reduces damage taken from Poison damage types by 20%.

name: Chosen Hunter
desc: Increases damage dealt to chosen targets by 10%

name: Resilient Plating
desc: When below 25% health, the Dreadnaught automatically regenerates 1% of their max health per second.

name: Get a Move On
desc: Increases run speed by 15% when weapon is holstered.

name: Knockout
desc: Increases damage of melee attack by 20% and adds a chance to stun the target.

name: Deflection Plating
desc: Enemy bullets that hit you have a 33% chance to ricochet and damage a nearby enemy.

name: Hellbent
desc: Suffering damage causes your Battleframe offensive systems to go into overdrive, receiving a 5% damage increase every time your Battleframe is hit. This stacks up to 25% bonus damage and lasts 15 seconds.

name: Incalescent Armor
desc: Reduces damage taken from Fire and Blast damage types by 20%.

name: Nanite Absorption
desc: Assault Exclusive Perk: gain 50% additional healing when picking up or using health packs.

name: Quick-Flexing Servos
desc: Increases jump height by 3m.

name: Plasma Enthusiast
desc: Energy and Plasma Weapons deal 10% additional damage.

name: Invigorate
desc: Activating an ability invigorates the user and their nearby allies; increasing movement and attack speed by 15%

name: Second Wind
desc: Rapidly killing 5 or more enemies when health is critical (Below 30% health) heals the user for 60% of their max health.

name: Powered Armor
desc: Reduces damage taken from Energy damage type by 20%.

name: Siphoning Unit
desc: Biotech Exclusive Perk: Siphoning Unit heals the user for 10% of any damage or healing they inflict. Does not work with damage inflicted by healing abilities.

name: Persistence
desc: Increases health regeneration.

name: Bio Blending
desc: Increases damage dealt while at full health by 10%.

name: Catalytic Poisons
desc: Targets hit with poison abilities have additional damage dealt as a delayed poison burst several seconds after being infected. Targets hit with poison damage take additional damage equal to 2.5x your power rating after every 3 seconds.

name: Toxic Finale
desc: Detonate a powerful poison bomb when incapacitated.

name: Kinetic Absorption
desc: Reduces damage taken from Bullet and Kinetic damage types by 20%.

name: Repairing Nanites
desc: Engineer Exclusive Perk: Your deployables are equipped with self-repair nanites.

name: Fuel Injectors
desc: Increases energy recharge rate by 20%.

name: Resonating Shields
desc: Increases the duration of all shield effects by 2 seconds.

name: Mounted Firepower
desc: Increases the damage of your deployables by 25%.

name: Hyper Kinesis Surge
desc: When HKM is activated, the user gains a 130% speed boost and a 50% defensive bonus.

name: Sprinter
desc: Increases sprint speed by an additional 5%.

name: Regenerative Plating
desc: Recon Exclusive Perk: Grants a short burst of health after a kill or assist. Each kill or assist grants 10% health over 2.5 seconds (5 ticks of 2% every 0.5 seconds). Does not stack.

name: Head Hunter
desc: Increases headshot damage by 10%.

name: SIN Precision
desc: Targets placed into SIN are visible behind walls.

name: Tactician
desc: Increases the effectiveness of debuffing abilities.

name: Energy Spikes
desc: Activating an ability will deploy an energy spike trap at the users location. Enemies in the trap are snared and take damage over time.

name: Prototype Pistons
desc: Increases base movement speed by 0.5 m a second.

name: Auxiliary Tanks
desc: Tigerclaw Exclusive Perk: Grants the Tigerclaw bonus energy regeneration whenever an ability is used.

name: Quick Hands
desc: Reduces weapon switching time by 30%.

name: Quick-Pivot Servos
desc: Increases run speed by 0.5m/s and sprint speed by 5%.

name: Eye of the Tiger
desc: Reduces the cooldown of movement abilities by 2.5 seconds.

name: Hunter
desc: Repeatedly striking the same target increases damage +10% per hit. (Maximum of +40% increase.)

name: Fast Hands
desc: Increases reload speed by 10%.

name: Incinerator
desc: Firecat Exclusive Perk: Targets that are hit by the Firecat's abilities are briefly set on fire, dealing damage over time.

name: Collateral Analytics
desc: Reduces damage done to yourself by 40%.

name: Epicenter
desc: Increases the damage dealt of PBAE abilities by 15%.

name: Corpse Combustion
desc: When an enemy is killed, there is a 25% chance that their corpse bursts into flames, damaging nearby enemies.

name: Flame Buffer
desc: Activating abilities creates a fire shield that burns nearby enemies. After several seconds, the buffer explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

name: Necrotic Poison
desc: Recluse Exclusive Perk: Dealing poison damage applies a necrotic poison that reduces the target's damage output.

name: Virus
desc: You inflict 5% additional damage with poison weapons and abilities.

name: Necrotic Bite
desc: Increases damage done to Humanoid targets by 10%.

name: Potent Toxins
desc: Weapons and Abilities that deal Poison Damage snare targets, slowing them by -80%. This movement slowing lasts 3 seconds.

name: Anatomy Lessons
desc: After dealing damage with your weapon, gain a 10% chance to get a critical shot on your next shot which does 150% weapon damage.

name: Rally
desc: Dragonfly Exclusive Perk: Dealing damage increases the Dragonfly's healing output, and healing increases the Dragonfly's damage output.

name: Bio Reserves
desc: Reduces the cooldown of all Healing abilities by 3 seconds.

name: Frequent Patient
desc: Increases healing received by 10%.

name: Combat Medic
desc: Reviving incapacitated players will restore them to full health. Additionally, increases the health regeneration of nearby allies.

name: Auto-Repair
desc: Doubles health regeneration when out of combat. Additionally, when greater than 40% life is dealt to the player in one instance of damage, applies the same regeneration bonus.

name: Personal Shield
desc: Rhino Exclusive Perk: When activating an ability, the Rhino briefly becomes shielded, absorbing a small amount of damage.

name: Back in Action
desc: Reduces respawn timer by 20%.

name: Stampede
desc: Sprinting snares nearby targets by 60%.

name: Kill Stealer
desc: Increases damage against critical targets (Below 50% health) by 30%.

name: Hero
desc: When health reaches zero, user becomes immune to damage for 5 seconds before dying.

name: Imminent Threat
desc: Mammoth Exclusive Perk: Enemies within 7 meters take 10% more damage.

name: Harden
desc: After taking damage, armor hardens to reduce your next source of damage taken by 25%. Harden has a 7 second internal cooldown.

name: Shields Up
desc: Increases the Health of all shields.

name: Thick Hide
desc: Increases base health (400hp at level 1).

name: Health Surge
desc: Activating an ability heals you for 15% of your max health. This can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

name: Ambush
desc: Nighthawk Exclusive Perk: While not aquired by enemy SIN, the Nighthawk's shots gain extra damage. This is a rate limited passive ability.

name: Ballistics Expert
desc: Increases bullet damage by 5%.

name: Spec. Ops
desc: Increases the duration of stealth abilities and reduces cooldown of teleport abilities by 3 seconds.

name: Sure Shot
desc: Damaging target has a 10% chance to trigger an +50% rate of fire boost for 3 seconds. Effect can only occur once every 7 seconds.

name: Concussion Shells
desc: Headshots reduce enemy movement speed and attack speed to 25% of normal. Additionally, headshots have a 25% chance to stun targets.

name: Conduit
desc: Raptor Exclusive Perk: Each hit of the Charge Rifle grants a stack of Conduit. Upon reaching three stacks, the next ability activated becomes Empowered, gaining additional effects. Using an Empowered Ability consumes all stacks.

name: Grenadier
desc: Reduces the cooldown on grenade abilities by 2 seconds.

name: Physicist
desc: Increases weapon charging speed by 10%.

name: Energy Shaping
desc: Changes your melee attack to a SIN blade, which extends melee range and increases damage.

name: Arcing Bolts
desc: Energy weapons chain weapon damage to nearby enemies. The chained bolt does 10% of the initial damage and jumps to new enemies within 1 meter. It can jump effectively infinite times, as long as there are applicable targets that have not been effected.

name: Overseer
desc: Bastion Exclusive Perk: All repairable deployables near the Bastion become shielded, reducing damage taken.

name: Hardware Genius
desc: Increases damage dealt to deployables, machinery and vehicles by 20%.

name: Resilient Alloys
desc: Increases health of your deployables by 25%.

name: Sentient Armor
desc: When hit, automatically adjusts battleframe armor to reduce damage from that damage type for 10 seconds. Adapts to Kinetic, Fire, Cryo and Poison damage types. Sentient armor has an internal cooldown of 30 seconds.

name: Deployable Repulsor
desc: Applies a repulsor unit to all of your owned deployables. The repulsor unit will detect enemies in close proximity and knock them back every 3 seconds. Does not work on large enemies such as Brontodons.

name: Dynamic Relay
desc: Electron Exclusive Perk: Dealing damage increases the strength of the Electron's shields, and apply shields increases the Electron's rate of fire.

name: Combustion Boost
desc: Adds an additional +40 Jet Energy.

name: Augmented Shield Generators
desc: Reduces the cooldown of shield abilities by 2.5 seconds.

name: High Yield Capacitors
desc: Activating your HKM instantly refreshes your cooldowns.

name: Rapid Kinesis Assemblage
desc: Increases the charge rate of HKM modules by 30%.

name: Munitions
desc: Arsenal Exclusive Perk: Each ability use provides the Arsenal with additional ammo.

name: Combat Veteran
desc: Increases reload and weapon switch speed 15%.

name: Stopping Power
desc: Increases the damage of the Shotgun and Grenade Launcher secondary weapons by 20% and adds a knockback effect.

name: Fully Loaded
desc: Increases magazine and total ammo capacities by 20%.

name: Explosives Expert
desc: Increases all explosive damage dealt from abilities by 25%.
